Name: Breakyo
About the game: A new Type of Classic Brick-Breaking game that breaks all conventions about Brick-Breakers, Destroy Bricks while growing big and eating masses, Generate your own bricks to manipulate space and Slow time to manage multiple Balls. Key-features : Grow-Big to eat smaller masses or Split mass for faster speeds Shoot-masses to destroy Bricks from a far Slow-time to keep up with the action Place-Bricks to manipulate the directions
Meta Title: Breakyo: Jul 25, 2022, Rudransh Shinghal and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Breakyo? Check out the release date (Jul 25, 2022), developer insights from Rudransh Shinghal, and a complete game summary.
